1.content:
Bridget was sitting on her couch watching TV. She saw nothing on her usual channels, so she went channel surfing. She stopped on a channel that showed a girl’s ass. They were speaking in Japanese, but the message was clear. This was an infomercial for a pill that expands your ass. Hmm. Should I order this pill? I think it’s a once in a lifetime chance. She puck up the phone and luckily you can talk to an English operator.
“Hello?” the operated said.
“Hi. Is this the company that sells butt expansion pills?”
“Yeah. We also sell breast expanding milk drinks, and belly expanding gummies. What would you like?”
1.title: The start

choices: After she got off the phone
11.content:
“I would like 50 of each please.”
“Are these all for you?”
“I’m not sure.”
“OK, if they are I should warn you of some side effects …”
“I don’t care! Just send them right over.”
“OK, I just need some information.”
11.title: 50 of each

112.content: After she got off the phone, she thought about some of the side effects. I wonder what they could be. She then thought of a prank idea. Sure she can use some on herself, but what if she uses some on her enemies. She thought of Selena Gomez, Miranda Cosgrove, Bella Thorne, etc. She acted like they were her best friends, but she hated their guts. She decided she would ...
112.title: After she got off the phone

1121.content: A few weeks later she invited ... over to show them her new mansion.
1121.title: Test them on herself

11211.content:
A few weeks later she invited Bella Thorne over, unaware of the package that would arrive.
“Come on in Bella.” She wanted to see how Bella would react to her new mansion.
“Nice place.”
“Thanks. Wait until you see the …” She was interrupted by a knock on the door. “I’ll get it,” she yelled. Bella wondered who it could be. Bridget answered the door. It was ...
11211.title: Bella Thorne

choices: Bring the milk mix to Bella
112111.content:
She signed a paper, and grabbed the 3 boxes. She ran to the kitchen and sat the boxes down.
“What’s in the boxes?”
“Oh, nothing, but can you wait in the living room?”
“Uh … sure.” As Bella ran off, Bridget opened a box. It contained the “milk”. She opened a bottle and poured it 3/4ths of the way into the cup. She then opened up another box. This one had the “pills” in it. She crushed up 6 pills and put the powder in the glass of milk. She opened the last box that had the “gummies” in it. She puck up a bag and read the back.
It said “Each colored gummy has a different effect. The green ones make your belly expand. The yellow ones make you extremely hungry. The red ones make you extremely thirsty.” She didn’t read it right. She thought the red ones made your belly expand instantly, the yellow ones made you extremely thirsty, and the green ones made you hungry. She decided to ...
112111.title: The FedEx Man

1121111.content:
“Here Bella, I got you a drink.”
“Thanks. I thought I was going to die of thirst.” They both laugh. She chugged it down, and felt a warm sensation flowing through her body. Once she felt this, she moaned. It felt nice to her. Did the mix work?
1121111.title: Bring the milk mix to Bella

11211112.content: Did it expand some part of her?
11211112.title: No

112111122.content:
Instead of causing anything to grow, she shitted herself. “Oh, no,” she said still turned on by the warm feeling that just remains in her ass and her boobs.
“What?” Bridget asked confused.
“I just ruined my new pink panties. I just took a gigantic shit in them.”
A side effect Bridget thought. “Uh … wait here Bella.” She ran out into the kitchen, and grabbed the envelope that was in the first box. She ripped it open and grabbed the paper.
It had a list of side effects of each of the 3 things she ordered. In big bold letters it said “DON’T MIX THE PRODUCTS. WAIT AT LEAST 2 HOURS BEFORE CONSUMING A DIFFERENT PRODUCT! IF YOU MIXED PRODUCTS, SIDE EFFECTS ARE MORE LIKELY TO HAPPEN. PLEASE REFER TO THE SIDE EFFECTS OF THE MIXED PRODUCTS.” The side effects of the ass expanding pills were laxative-like effects, involuntary peeing and ‘squirting’, and farting loud and stinky farts. For the breast expansion milk, the side effects were lactating uncontrollably, back and breast pains, nipple hardening, and sexual urges. And lastly the side effects for the belly expanding gummies were peeing for long periods of time, laxative-like effects, farting loud and stinky farts, burping violently, puking (unlikely), loud gurgling, belly pains, bloating, urge to eat or drink anything, etc. She didn’t read all this. She read up to the part that says “side effects of the ass expanding pills…” After that she decided to
112111122.title: No
